metadata.title: Ruedata - Tire Management with AI
metadata.description: Software that saves up to 30% on tire expenses while improving fleet safety and sustainability

demo.title: Schedule Demo
demo.description: Schedule a demo of RueData's tire management solution

hero.title: Digitalize and optimize tire management with AI
hero.subtitle: Software that saves up to 30% on tire expenses while improving fleet safety and sustainability

footer.aipower: AI-powered tire management solutions for transportation fleets.

features.title: Solution for transportation fleets
features.content: Our goal is to transform the transportation industry by reducing tire consumption and maximizing the profitability of your fleet's operating expenses.
features.maintenanceTeamParagraph: Minimize field downtime and optimize planning time
features.procurementParagraph: Tire purchase based on real performance data
features.fleetManagerParagraph: Track key metrics and make data-driven decisions
features.title6: With Ruedata, your drivers get home safely
features.p1: Reduce inspection time and minimize errors with automated data collection.
features.p2: Prevent blowouts, reduce service costs, and minimize vehicle downtime.
features.p3: Gain full visibility and control over your entire tire operation in one platform.
features.p4: Automated maintenance plans to optimize performance and reduce manual work.
features.p5: Extend tire life, increase retreading, and cut costs by up to 30%.
features.p6: Our AI-powered platform prevents tire-related accidents by ensuring optimal maintenance, timely replacements, and real-time monitoring. Reduce blowouts, minimize downtime, and give your team the confidence to drive worry-free.
features.extendLife: Extend tire life, increase retreading, and cut costs by up to 30%.
features.smarterTitle: A smarter way to manage tires
features.smarterParagraph: We connect fleets, managers, and maintenance teams through a single platform, reducing tire costs, improving safety, and optimizing performance.

cemex.title: CEMEX MEXICO
cemex.description: By centralizing tire data and optimizing maintenance, we’ve improved operational efficiency, enhanced traceability, and reduced tire-related costs across Cemex’s supply chain.

logistics.title: GRUPO LOGISTICS
logistics.description: Ruedata replaced our error-prone paper processes with a digital solution, saving us 40% on tire expenses. It offers valuable insights into tire performance, helping us make smarter investment decisions. We went from spending nearly a million per month on tires to 60% of that cost.

emsula.title: EMSULA
emsula.description: Ruedata gave us KPIs we didn’t have before, improving purchasing decisions and tire maintenance. It helped us control expenses despite rising costs and changed our tire management culture for the better.

green.title: GREEN MOVIL
green.description: With Ruedata, we cut tire costs by 30% and went from needing six people for tire management to just one. It simplified complex processes and maximized tire usage, driving significant savings.

traxion.title: TRAXION
traxion.description: Ruedata provides crucial data visibility across our 7,000 vehicles, boosting operational efficiency. It strikes the right balance between quality and price, offering top-notch business intelligence for decision-making at all levels.

form.success: Thank you for your interest! We will get back to you soon.

about.title: About us
about.subtitle: We Keep You Rolling
about.fullContent: We Keep You Rolling Chattanooga-based company shaping the future of mobility for the freight and logistics industry. Ruedata was founded with a clear mission: to reduce unnecessary tire consumption and optimize fleet operations through data. Traditionally, fleets relied on manufacturer recommendations rather than real-world performance. We discovered that tire wear is influenced by multiple operational variables—not just brand or type. A key insight came from urban transit fleets, where exit-door tires wore out faster due to passenger weight distribution. This led us to build an AI-powered platform that helps fleets make smarter decisions, maximize tire lifespan, reduce costs, and enhance road safety. Today, Ruedata partners with global leaders like Heineken, DHL, Bimbo, Cemex, and Coca-Cola bottlers, delivering measurable savings and sustainability. Smarter decisions. Safer roads. Stronger fleets.
